values.title: Clarity over complexity
values.description: I aim for interfaces and code that make sense at a glance — no unnecessary layers.

values.title: Function + Feel — never one without the other
values.description: What works should also feel good. I design for both usability and delight.

values.title: Testing like a user, building like a dev
values.description: I instinctively test for friction and usability — not just technical correctness.

values.title: Adaptability, ownership, and the hunger to improve
values.description: I evolve with the project, take initiative, and keep pushing quality forward.

values.title: Full-circle thinking — done means complete from all angles
values.description: I don’t ship unless every detail — UX, logic, performance, and polish — is complete.

values.title: Structure, readability, and clean code always
values.description: I write clean, readable code that’s easy to understand and maintain.

values.title: Security is a default, not an afterthought
values.description: I build with security in mind from the very first line — validation, auth, and more.

values.title: Pixel-perfect attention to detail
values.description: 1px off? I see it. And fix it. Transitions, spacing, states — they all matter.

values.title: Design sense meets developer sense
values.description: I understand both design intent and dev feasibility — and balance the two.

values.title: Independence with collaboration where it matters
values.description: I move fast on my own, but collaborate deeply where alignment is key.

values.title: Reliable delivery with pride and thoroughness
values.description: I build every feature like it’s mine — and make sure it works, beautifully.
